angstd.ui.views.view.renderer
Interface Renderer

All Known Subinterfaces:
DomainViewRenderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultDomainViewRenderer, DomainLinealRenderer, DomainTooltipRenderer, SequenceSelectionRenderer
public interface Renderer

All renderer assigned to a view must implement the renderer() method.

The AbstractView implementation triggers this render method for each added renderer during the view rendering.

For further details look into AbstractView.

Author:
Andreas Held

Method Summary

          Specifies the rendering process for the renderer.
